title: Bonjour Chums! It's type ID time again!
content:
hullo all,

any of you fontophiles got a name for this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110408161812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/http:/typophile.com/files/W&T.jpg)

Given my client I don't think it's too rare.

Thanks in advance for your help.

Lev

comments.content:
[Codex](http://web.archive.org/web/20110408161812/http:/www.identifont.com/show?2BJ)

BTW, you can do better: See FAQ #2: Please use a [descriptive title for your posting](http://web.archive.org/web/20110408161812/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2) next time.
